[/quote]

It did for me I didn’t know about the NPC handler bit. Becuase like what the other dude said it was bugged and i didn’t get any XP but because of the NPC handler now i get the XP

Thanks Bro for the Guide :)[/quote]
Don’t gravedig.

Here is something to add to your tut.

            else if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == **** && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == taskID) {
		MaxHit *= 2.0;
	}

Thats goes in your maxhit method, for slayer helm against task.

Also, if anyone can help me find a way to make a Balmung hit better against Daggonths, Kings, and anything daggonth

item.title: [317] Delta Slayer MASSIVE TUT [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Actually his code states that if their slayer level is greater than one, they cannot attack. The correct code would be

if (playerLevel[18] < 1) { // If less than 1 you cannot attack. sM("You must be level 1 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Delta Slayer MASSIVE TUT [317]
item.dc:creator: @Beastly-Scape Beastly-Scape
item.description:
@Beastly-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:13, topic:356064”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=452604.msg3317795#msg3317795 date=1282442183]

Search for:
if (type ==

Something like this should show:

	if (type == 1616) {
		if (playerLevel[18] > 1) {
			sM("You must be level 1 slayer or higher to attack this monster.");
			ResetAttackNPC();
			return false;

Shouldn’t it say that you need level 2 or higher? (The code playerLevel[18] > 1 only includes Slayer levels 2 and above).

Fixed Code:

if (type == 1616) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) { sM("You must be level 1 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false;

Please tell me if I’m wrong…

< 1

Judging by the message, it’s if your level is lower than one.
[/quote]
He’s right, That’s making it so noone with 1-99 slayer can attack it. Wtf?[/quote]
No it says “you must have level 1 slayer” so people with 1 slayer can attack it and then it says “or higher” so anyone can attack that. If you did level 2 or higher slayer then people just starting slayer couldnt attack it. Making slayer impossible right?

Read full topic
